data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song]
[ar:Lauren Daigle]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song - Lauren Daigle (劳伦·戴格尔)
[00:43.43]Chestnuts roasting on an open fire
[00:52.45]Jack Frost nipping on your nose
[01:01.80]Yuletide carols being sung by a choir
[01:08.82]And folks dressed up like Eskimos
[01:17.03]Everybody knows a turkey and some mistletoe
[01:27.24]Help to make the season bright bright
[01:37.60]Tiny tots with their eyes all aglow
[01:44.92]Will find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:52.57]They know that Santa's on his way
[02:01.33]He's loaded lots of toys and goodies on his sleigh
[02:10.24]And every mother's child is going to spy
[02:19.21]To see if reindeer really know how to fly
[02:29.38]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[02:38.45]To kids from one to ninety-two
[02:47.47]Although it's been said many times many ways
[02:56.11]Merry Christmas to you
[03:41.25]And so I'm offering this simple phrase
[03:50.17]To kids from one to ninety-two
[03:59.31]Although it's been said many times many ways
[04:07.98]Merry Christmas
[04:11.47]Oh Merry Christmas
[04:15.84]Oh Merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:The Christmas Song]
[ar:Lauren Daigle]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:43.43]在明火上烤着板栗
[00:52.45]JackFrost轻咬你的鼻子
[01:01.80]唱诗班唱着圣诞颂歌
[01:08.82]人们打扮得像爱斯基摩人
[01:17.03]每个人都知道一只火鸡和槲寄生花环
[01:27.24]让这个季节变得更加美好
[01:37.60]小屁孩双眼通红
[01:44.92]今晚会难以入眠
[01:52.57]他们知道圣诞老人就要来了
[02:01.33]他的雪橇上放了很多玩具和好东西
[02:10.24]每个母亲的孩子都会暗中窥探
[02:19.21]想看看驯鹿是否真的懂得飞翔
[02:29.38]所以我给你一句简单的话
[02:38.45]致从一岁到九十二岁的孩子
[02:47.47]尽管这句话已经说过很多次很多次
[02:56.11]祝你圣诞快乐
[03:41.25]所以我给你一句简单的话
[03:50.17]致从一岁到九十二岁的孩子
[03:59.31]尽管这句话已经说过很多次很多次
[04:07.98]圣诞快乐
[04:11.47]圣诞快乐
[04:15.84]祝你圣诞快乐
